items.title: Upload Video
items.description: Drag and drop your video or browse to select it. We support formats like MP4, AVI, and MOV.

items.title: AI Compression
items.description: Our advanced algorithms optimize file size by analyzing and compressing your video data seamlessly.

items.title: Download Compressed Video

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Learn more about using our Video Compressor

items.title: What formats can I compress?
items.description: You can compress videos in various formats, including MP4, AVI, MOV, and more. Our tool is designed to handle common video types easily.

items.title: Is this service free?
items.description: Absolutely! Each user receives 30 free credits daily, ideal for compressing multiple videos. Boost your credits through user interactions or opt for subscription plans for more features.

items.title: Can I use the compressed videos commercially?
items.description: Yes, users with a subscription can freely use compressed videos for commercial purposes, while free-tier users can use them for personal needs only.

items.title: How does privacy protection work?
items.description: Videos are processed directly within your browser using advanced technology. They are never stored or uploaded elsewhere, ensuring your content remains private.

footer.heading: Ready to Optimize Your Videos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and elevate your video sharing experience. No sign-up required.
